channel.title: Consultation on Steve Hemingway's website
channel.description: Recent content in Consultation on Steve Hemingway's website

item.title: CAA consultation
item.description: I received the following email letter today, and I thought it would be useful to share it with local residents. Luton airport is an important local employer, as well as a very important public transport hub for us all, but it does create some problems. The CAA are keen to hear your views. Steve. Letter from CAA Dear Cllr Hemingway The Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) is currently consulting on a new decision making process for all future airspace changes.
